count.text: count of the all connected gamepad devices

gamepadChildrensCount.text: count of Gamepad instances inside scope

gamepadPollingInterval.text: startup delay before gamepads polling because there is no gamepad events

eventPollingInterval.text: gamepad event polling timer interval default value is 8ms (for 120fps) because there is no gamepad events

connected.text: emitted when any gamepad is connected
